Project M USB Loader 3.6 \\Configurable SD/USB Loader v70r78.11 by oggzee, usptactical, gannon, Dr. Clipper, R2-D2199, FIX94, airline38, Howard, NiTRo THe DeMoN 20180513 PMDT \\Kirbeast, waffeln The premier Brawl modification
Project M is a mod inspired by Super Smash Bros. Melee's gameplay designed to add rich, technical gameplay to a balanced cast of characters while additionally enhancing the speed of play. Project M employs new codes which seamlessly add in new, universal features to the entire cast to add technical variety to all characters.
This is a modified version of CFG USB Loader designed for instantly loading Project M with USB.
RSBP01 intro = 0 device = usb partition = auto ios = 249 video = system video_patch = all ocarina = 1 hooktype = axframe
